name: Sword (kirshak)
description:
• Description: "Sword" is a small action arcade game, were the player have to hold his ground against an everlasting wave of evil zombies. Survive as long as you can or die trying.

• Features : endless waves of enemies, survival mechanics, scaling difficulties and high score mechanic.

• Release date: available now, but more update will come!

• platform: PC

• Price: Free

• Language: English
